website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a VIZIO TV with a large screen and smart technology, this model is worth a look. However, you will pay a premium price for this model compared to others we considered.
pros: Ideal for setting up a home theater thanks to the 75-inch screen
Smart technology is responsive, and streaming your favorite apps is easy
Nice XLED picture quality that produces beautiful colors
TV and remote are easy to set up
cons: Older model (2017), but the technology it offers is still notable

customer_reviews.title: Really nice television.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing TV...great, crisp color...easy to set up...good sound even without a soundbar.. We already own one and are now ordering a second...
customer_reviews.author: Missy H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent budget TV
customer_reviews.text: Excellent large tv for tight budget. Color accuracy is spot on out of the box when using standard mode. Colors are vibrant and contrast is very good for the price. Wish the TV was a little bit brighter but that is a minor con. Also, I see a very slight hint of motion blur when watching football but that is also a slight con for this price. Overall picture quality is exceptional. I'm coming from a history of only using Samsung and Sony TVs and projectors. This TV is definitely better than any previous Samsung TV I've owned. Would definitely recommend this TV for watching movies and tv shows. Sharp, vibrant colors and high native contrast picture.
customer_reviews.author: Barrett Withers

customer_reviews.title: Stand behind your product!!
customer_reviews.text: Tv worked for a little over 2 years, it is not use everyday. One day it would not turn on. Vizio reaponded with “I would reach out to your credit card company as they may have automatic purchase protection programs as a perk for being their client. Otherwise by the symptoms you’ve explained you need to have the tv repaired. I would recommed taking the tv to a local tv repair shop.” When I told them they dont stand behind their products for an obvious defect, they replied, “Vizio stands behind their product with a 1 year manufacture warranty.” I think a tv that is over $1000 should last longer than 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Junathon

customer_reviews.title: Good god, save yourself the headache and avoid this slow, terrible, clunky, piece of garbage tv.
customer_reviews.text: What a dissappointment. Had this tv a while now. It just has so many issues. Slowest start up imaginable. No product support or updates whatsoever. Randomly drops the startup page and just hangs on a black screen, then requires you to load an app and then exit it in order to get to the actual home page. This is pretty much the only way to get to the home screen now upon start up. Rediculous. I know it's a cheap tv, but this thing shouldn't even be on the shelves. Total p.o.s.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING THEATER FOR THE HOME
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the NEGATIVE reviews, this is an AMAZING TV, with an AWSOME PICTURE. This TV does not come with a coaxial cable, OUTMODED, or a TV tuner, UNTRENDY. If you want to see regular channels, than you must have a cable box. The new generation STREAM everything now in our days, and CABLE will be obsolete soon. I love the TV, PICTURE, SOUND, and above all the SIZE.!.!.! A whole NEW EXPERIENCE watching MOVIES and SPORTS on TV.... I LOVE IT!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and colors at any price
customer_reviews.text: Got a steal paid $1100 at Sam’s Great picture very crisp sharp colors ... well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: J Sinrich

customer_reviews.title: This is a great TV.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV... Anyone looking for a 4k tv doesn't care that there is no tuner if they did they wouldn't purchase a 4k. Fantastic product and great picture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Avoid Vizio at all costs. They can't get anything right. They just barely (7/01/2019) added a YouTube app. Yes, it's 2019 and they just BARELY added a YouTube app. Even then it still sucks because smartcast NEVER works.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Pedroza

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this TV and set up and the picture ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV and set up and the picture has vertical and horizontal lines. It apparently was damaged in their manufacturing or in transport. However, Vizio will not honor their warranty saying the damage was not their fault. I do not know how they can conclude it was not damaged when they packed it. I will never buy Vizio again. They offered me a replacement for 1100$. That was their only offer of help.
customer_reviews.author: Annoymous

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT A TV!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The FCC may be interested in how this ad is posted. For a TV to be listed as such it must include a tuner. If it does not it needs to be listed as a display panel. False advertising or misleading advertising is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a TV. Doesn’t have a TV ...
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a TV. Doesn’t have a TV tuner. Doesn’t even have a coaxial cable input. If you want free local channels - you have to buy a separate converter box and an antenna. Just make sure you know what your buying. Does work if you pay for cable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: VIZIO 75" Class XLED 4K Ultra HD SmartCast Home Theater Display - E75-E1/E3
product_meta.description: Introducing the all-new VIZIO Smart Cast E-Series 75" Class (74.50” Diag.) Ultra HD HDR XLED Display. Powered by XLED, VIZIO’s powerful full-array local dimming backlight technology, the 2017 E-Series offers enhanced contrast, deep black levels, and stunning clarity. VIZIO XHDR with HDR10 content support, enables a wider range of contrast and depth. 4K Ultra HD delivers 4X the resolution of 1080p for breathtaking, lifelike clarity. And Xtreme Black Engine uses 14 local dimming zones to dynamically adapt brightness to the on-screen image for deep black levels. Access top apps like Netflix more easily with Smart Cast TV, using the included remote to browse and launch content directly from the big screen. Smart Cast TV makes finding something to watch more fun - discover new shows including movies in 4K Ultra HD and HDR. Plus, you can quickly set up and adjust settings right on the display using the remote. Part of the VIZIO Smart Cast collection, every E-Series features Chromecast built-in, the easiest way to stream your entertainment from thousands of apps you know and love onto the big screen. Simply tap the Cast button in Chromecast-enabled apps you have on your phone and watch your entertainment play on the big screen - or use your voice to control your display with the Google Assistant on devices like Google Home. Download VIZIO Smart Cast Mobile and turn your phone into the ultimate remote - stream and control your display from any room in your home.
feature_bullets: 4K Ultra HD Picture: Enjoy every scene in breathtaking detail and clarity with over 8 million pixels, 4x the resolution of 1080p Full HD
Use the included remote to browse and launch top apps and content directly from the big screen - discover new shows including movies in 4K UHD and HDR.
All-new remote included: Easily set up and control your display with the included remote. With simple access to the new on-screen menu, use the remote to adjust all basic and advanced menu settings.
Easily stream apps on the big screen: Download Chromecast-enabled apps to your mobile device, then simply tap the Cast button to stream your entertainment on the big screen.
Download VIZIO Smart Cast Mobile: Use your smartphone to control your E-Series - power on/off, adjust volume, switch inputs, stream entertainment to the big screen from any room in your home.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.7 out of 5 stars12 ratings2.7 out of 5 stars
